mapper.select: select trunc(m.created_date) day,count(*) as count FROM member m where trunc(m.created_date)<=TRUNC(sysdate) and trunc(m.created_date)>=trunc(sysdate-6) and deleted = 'N' group by trunc(m.created_date) order by trunc(m.created_date)

select TO_CHAR(m.created_date, 'YYYY-MM') as month,count(*) as count FROM member m where TO_CHAR(m.created_date, 'YYYY-MM') <=TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM') and TO_CHAR(m.created_date, 'YYYY-MM')>=TO_CHAR(add_months(sysdate, -11), 'YYYY-MM') and deleted = 'N' group by TO_CHAR(m.created_date, 'YYYY-MM') order by TO_CHAR(m.created_date, 'YYYY-MM')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT b.board_title, m.user_nick, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY b.board_id) + b.board_viewcount AS COUNT FROM boardlike li JOIN board b ON li.board_id = b.board_id JOIN member m ON m.user_id = b.user_id where trunc(b.created_date)<=trunc(sysdate) and trunc(b.created_date)>=trunc(sysdate-6) and b.deleted = 'N' and b.blocked='N' and board_category ='FEED' ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10

select DISTINCT trunc(created_date) as day,board_category, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY trunc(created_date),board_category) as count from board where trunc(created_date)<=TRUNC(SYSDATE) and trunc(created_date)>=trunc(sysdate-6) and deleted = 'N' and blocked = 'N' and board_category !='FEED' order by trunc(created_date)
